divs: Sighting DetailsI had just left a public reception for our University Sustainability Conference. I looked up and I saw a very bright star like object dropping from the zenith toward the horizon. much slower than a meteor. but with a bright and steady, slightly orangish-white light unlike any plane. it was a straight path. there was no sound from it. it slowed as it approached the horizon. though that may have been due to a perceptive and distance effect and then is was lost from my view behind structures. around a minute for the whole event. it looked like a falling star but lasted so long.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Chico
There were no other sightings in Chico on or around March 1st 2012
